Great CMYK Art

Published: 2009-11-15

There is a great post over at PrintRadar highlighting some cool designs using CMYK as their color palate. There are some really stunning examples listed.

A couple of my favorites are below.

Fashion victim by cloning

CMYK Explosion by rajdesigns

Head over to PrintRadar and check out the rest.Any other great CMYK art out there? Let me know in the comments.
